SeriesInfo¶

The SeriesInfo class is used to store series metadata - for example, any options that apply to the series, and when recording began.

class SeriesInfo¶

Contains time-series metadata.

Public Functions

SeriesInfo()¶

Constructs a SeriesInfo object.

Public Members

int Options¶

Series options (stepping, etc.)

TIMESTAMP FirstSample¶

The first TIMESTAMP for this series
